original_text: And the shapes of the locusts were like unto horses prepared unto battle; and on their heads were as it were crowns like gold, and their faces were as the faces of men.
korean_text: 황충들의 모양은 전쟁을 위하여 준비한 말들 같고 그 머리에 금 같은 관 비슷한 것을 썼으며 그 얼굴은 사람의 얼굴 같고

sentences.original_text: And the shapes of locusts were like unto horses
and on their heads were as it were crowns like gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 머리에는 마치 금과 같은 왕관들이 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and their faces were as faces of men
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 얼굴은 사람의 얼굴과 같더라
